__e: You put the gun down, and we'll make sure you get out of here safely.
"Why don't you just put down the gun and go home?"
All right, why don't you put the gun down before someone sees you?
So, why don't you put the key away and, uh, stick to the role you're best at?
I knew it was you bringing your dog in here, shitting all over the place.
I don't understand why you don't just dump the kid and go home.
So it's not really a rescue plan. It's a full scale attack.
You still have much to learn about yourself. About being a warrior. Neither of you truly know what we will all face in full-scale war with the Goa'uld.
It's a lot more complicated than that, sir, but I do think we're ready for a large-scale test.
Why don't you put that thing down and help me?
Why don't you put that down and come sit next to me.
Unless we give her what she wants.
Leave him and be with me.
This is the moment where you leave him and come with me.
But he said no one leaves him.
If you know so much, why don't you cut the creepy phone call crap and let's meet?
- Leave me, what are you doing?
You can... the door is wide enough... but you may not!
I mean, why don't you quit and get The Fear?
I mean, what does she expect, for me to want to go with the girl who dumped me?
His wife leaves him and he keeps her stuff laying around for months?
